articles.title: Indian-American Man's Rs 8,300 Crore Fraud Scheme Shakes Top US Investors - NDTV
articles.description: An Indian-American businessman Rishi Shah, the former billionaire cofounder of Outcome Health, has been sentenced to seven and a half years in prison by a US court.
articles.content:
The facade began to crumble in 2017 when a media expose brought the fraudulent activities into light.

articles.title: Kevin Costner’s ‘Horizon’ Box Office Boondoggle: ‘Yellowstone’ Fans Are (Largely) a No Show - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: Costner's ambitious Western 'Horizon: An American Saga — Chapter One' could barely break out of the barn in its North American debut, and yet there's already a sequel set for release in August (with a third resuming production that month, too).
